<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 106 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
While the following items are generally tailored for animal companions and similar creatures, some of them are equally useful to player characters and NPCs.
</column>

</column>

</row>
name: Animal Companion Mobility Aids
